publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3600# Dennis Canavan: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease-That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the European Chronic Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patient Manifesto supported by seventeen European nations in recognition of the increasing incidence of COPD across the world; notes that Scotland has one of the highest incidences of COPD in Europe, and considers that the Scottish Executive should ensure that the necessary preventative action is taken to reduce the incidence of COPD and to guarantee adequate standards of treatment for COPD patients. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Russell*, Mr George Reid*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr John McAllion*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Colin Campbell*, Michael Matheson*, Bruce Crawford*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3600# Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (lodged on 19 November 2002) Alex Neil*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mary Scanlon*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3600# Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (lodged on 19 November 2002) Fiona McLeod*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-3600# Dennis Canavan: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Diseaseâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the European Chronic Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patient Manifesto supported by seventeen European nations in recognition of the increasing incidence of COPD across the world; notes that Scotland has one of the highest incidences of COPD in Europe, and considers that the Scottish Executive should ensure that the necessary preventative action is taken to reduce the incidence of COPD and to guarantee adequate standards of treatment for COPD patients. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Michael Russell, Mr George Reid, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr John McAllion, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Colin Campbell, Michael Matheson, Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Roseanna Cunningham, Mary Scanlon, Stewart Stevenson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Fiona McLeod, Donald Gorrie, Irene McGugan*, Shona Robison*
S1M-3600# Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (lodged on 19 November 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3600# Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (lodged on 19 November 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, John Scott*
S1M-3600# Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (lodged on 19 November 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3600# Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (lodged on 19 November 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3600# Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (lodged on 19 November 2002) Elaine Smith*
